article_title: N.Y. Fed: Business Conditions Decline Fourth Straight Month
article_text:
Business conditions in the state of New York continued to deteriorate in November, declining for a fourth straight month despite recent signs of stabilization in the U.S. manufacturing sector, according to the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.

The Empire State’s business conditions index came in at -10.7 this month, compared with -11.4 in October and -14.7 in September. Economists surveyed by The Wall Street Journal expected the...
